General.Name: Chongqing Sanfeng Environment Group Corp Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing Sanfeng Environment Group Corp., Ltd. provides services in the waste to energy industry in China and internationally. Its services include project investment, construction, operation, and equipment supply. The company also engages in leachate treatment, and waste collection and transfer business. Chongqing Sanfeng Environment Group Corp., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Chongqing, China.
